creator: smcardle@spansurf.com
text:
Having now got events generated and displayed in Chainsaw (Thanks Scott) I seem 
to have no way to view my MDC. We do not use the NDC for logging as we use the %
X pattern on the MDC for use with our fileAppender and datagramAppender.

Regards

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
Sadly, MDC is the other piece of LoggingEvent that is not serial-compatible
between log4j 1.2.x and the latest version of Chainsaw (really log4j 1.3alpha).

There is no workaround for this, but again we will get it fixed.

creator: michael.mewes@neofonie.de
text:
Hi,
is there any estimate when this will be fixed?

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Believe this is addressed with the move of Chainsaw back to a log4j 1.2 codebase.
